tasks.title: Buy groceries
tasks.description: Buy all essential groceries from the local market including vegetables, fruits, milk, bread, and other household items needed for the week.

tasks.title: Pay electricity bill
tasks.description: Log in to the electricity board website and pay the monthly electricity bill before the due date to avoid late charges or service interruptions.

tasks.title: Doctor appointment
tasks.description: Visit Dr. Sharma for a general health checkup, discuss recent symptoms if any, get routine tests done, and collect prescriptions or follow-up instructions.

tasks.title: Complete project report
tasks.description: Work on the pending project report by organizing all data, writing detailed sections, reviewing errors, and preparing it for final submission to the manager.

tasks.title: Car service
tasks.description: Take the car to the authorized service center for a full inspection including oil change, brake check, tire rotation, and cleaning to ensure proper maintenance.
